verses.verse: חַכְמ֣וֹת <S%H2454><s%> Every wise נָ֭שִׁים <S%H802><s%> woman בָּנְתָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> buildeth בֵיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> her house וְ֝אִוֶּ֗לֶת <S%H200><s%> but the foolish בְּיָדֶ֥יהָ <S%H3027><s%> with her hands תֶהֶרְסֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2040><s%> plucketh it down

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> He that walketh בְּ֭יָשְׁרוֹ <S%H3476><s%> in his uprightness יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> feareth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּנְל֖וֹז <S%H3868><s%> but [he that is] perverse דְּרָכָ֣יו <S%H1870><s%> in his ways בּוֹזֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H959><s%> despiseth

בְּֽפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> In the mouth אֱ֭וִיל <S%H191><s%> of the foolish חֹ֣טֶר <S%H2415><s%> [is] a rod גַּאֲוָ֑ה <S%H1346><s%> of pride וְשִׂפְתֵ֥י <S%H8193><s%> but the lips חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים <S%H2450><s%> of the wise תִּשְׁמוּרֵֽם׃ <S%H8104><s%> shall preserve

בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no אֲ֭לָפִים <S%H504><s%> Where no oxen אֵב֣וּס <S%H18><s%> [are] the crib בָּ֑ר <S%H1249><s%> [is] clean וְרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> but much תְּ֝בוּא֗וֹת <S%H8393><s%> increase בְּכֹ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> [is] by the strength שֽׁוֹר׃ <S%H7794><s%> of the ox

עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness אֱ֭מוּנִים <S%H529><s%> A faithful לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יְכַזֵּ֑ב <S%H3576><s%> lies וְיָפִ֥יחַ <S%H6315><s%> will utter כְּ֝זָבִ֗ים <S%H3577><s%> will not lie עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> but a false

בִּקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh לֵ֣ץ <S%H3887><s%> A scorner חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וָאָ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> and none וְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> and [findeth it] not but knowledge לְנָב֣וֹן <S%H995><s%> unto him that understandeth נָקָֽל׃ <S%H7043><s%> [is] easy

לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Leave מִ֭נֶּגֶד <S%H5048><s%> from the presence לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man כְּסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> of a foolish וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> you will not יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> when thou perceivest שִׂפְתֵי־ <S%H8193><s%> not [in him] the lips דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge

חָכְמַ֣ת <S%H2451><s%> The wisdom עָ֭רוּם <S%H6175><s%> of the prudent הָבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> [is] to understand דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way וְאִוֶּ֖לֶת <S%H200><s%> but the folly כְּסִילִ֣ים <S%H3684><s%> of fools מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> [is] deceit

אֱ֭וִלִים <S%H191><s%> Fools יָלִ֣יץ <S%H3887><s%> make a mock אָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> at sin וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> among יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> but among the righteous רָצֽוֹן׃ <S%H7522><s%> [there is] favour

לֵ֗ב <S%H3820><s%> The heart י֭וֹדֵעַ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth מָרַּ֣ת <S%H4751><s%> angry נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own וּ֝בְשִׂמְחָת֗וֹ <S%H8057><s%> with his joy לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִתְעָ֥רַב <S%H6148><s%> doth not intermeddle זָֽר׃ <S%H2114><s%> and a stranger

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> The house רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יִשָּׁמֵ֑ד <S%H8045><s%> shall be overthrown וְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> but the tabernacle יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> of the upright יַפְרִֽיחַ׃ <S%H6524><s%> shall flourish

יֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> a way יָ֭שָׁר <S%H3477><s%> which seemeth right לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> unto אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man וְ֝אַחֲרִיתָ֗הּ <S%H319><s%> but the end דַּרְכֵי־ <S%H1870><s%> thereof [are] the ways מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even בִּשְׂח֥וֹק <S%H7814><s%> Even in laughter יִכְאַב־ <S%H3510><s%> is sorrowful לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖הּ <S%H319><s%> and the end שִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> of that mirth תוּגָֽה׃ <S%H8424><s%> [is] heaviness

מִדְּרָכָ֣יו <S%H1870><s%> with his own ways יִ֭שְׂבַּע <S%H7646><s%> shall be filled ס֣וּג <S%H5472><s%> The backslider לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> in heart וּ֝מֵעָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> and a good

פֶּ֭תִי <S%H6612><s%> The simple יַאֲמִ֣ין <S%H539><s%> believeth לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> every word וְ֝עָר֗וּם <S%H6175><s%> but the prudent יָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> [man] looketh well לַאֲשֻׁרֽוֹ׃ <S%H838><s%> to his going

חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> A wise יָ֭רֵא <S%H3373><s%> [man] feareth וְסָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> and departeth מֵרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> from evil וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> but the fool מִתְעַבֵּ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> rageth וּבוֹטֵֽחַ׃ <S%H982><s%> and is confident

קְֽצַר־ <S%H7116><s%> [He that is] soon אַ֭פַּיִם <S%H639><s%> angry יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> dealeth אִוֶּ֑לֶת <S%H200><s%> foolishly וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and a man מְ֝זִמּ֗וֹת <S%H4209><s%> of wicked devices יִשָּׂנֵֽא׃ <S%H8130><s%> is hated

נָחֲל֣וּ <S%H5157><s%> inherit פְתָאיִ֣ם <S%H6612><s%> The simple אִוֶּ֑לֶת <S%H200><s%> folly וַֽ֝עֲרוּמִ֗ים <S%H6175><s%> but the prudent יַכְתִּ֥רוּ <S%H3803><s%> are crowned דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> with knowledge

שַׁח֣וּ <S%H7817><s%> bow רָ֭עִים <S%H7451><s%> The evil לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> the good וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> at שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <S%H8179><s%> at the gates צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even לְ֭רֵעֵהוּ <S%H7453><s%> even of his own neighbour יִשָּׂ֣נֵא <S%H8130><s%> is hated רָ֑שׁ <S%H7326><s%> The poor וְאֹהֲבֵ֖י <S%H157><s%> friends עָשִׁ֣יר <S%H6223><s%> but the rich רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> [hath] many

בָּז־ <S%H936><s%> He that despiseth לְרֵעֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour חוֹטֵ֑א <S%H2398><s%> sinneth וּמְחוֹנֵ֖ן <S%H2603><s%> but he that hath mercy [עֲנָיִים כ] (עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6041><s%> afflicted ק) אַשְׁרָֽיו׃ <S%H835><s%> happy

הֲ‍ֽלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִ֭תְעוּ <S%H8582><s%> Do they not err חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <S%H2790><s%> that devise רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity וְחֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> favour וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> and truth חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <S%H2790><s%> [shall be] to them that devise טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֶ֭צֶב <S%H6089><s%> In all labour יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become מוֹתָ֑ר <S%H4195><s%> there is profit וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> but the talk שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <S%H8193><s%> of the lips אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> only לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <S%H4270><s%> [tendeth] only to penury

עֲטֶ֣רֶת <S%H5850><s%> The crown חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> of the wise עָשְׁרָ֑ם <S%H6239><s%> [is] their riches אִוֶּ֖לֶת <S%H200><s%> [but] the foolishness כְּסִילִ֣ים <S%H3684><s%> of fools אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <S%H200><s%> [is] folly

מַצִּ֣יל <S%H5337><s%> delivereth נְ֭פָשׁוֹת <S%H5315><s%> souls עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness אֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> A true וְיָפִ֖חַ <S%H6315><s%> [witness] speaketh כְּזָבִ֣ים <S%H3577><s%> lies מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> but a deceitful

בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> In the fear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God מִבְטַח־ <S%H4009><s%> confidence עֹ֑ז <S%H5797><s%> [is] strong וּ֝לְבָנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> and his children יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will have מַחְסֶֽה׃ <S%H4268><s%> shall have a place of refuge

יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> [is] a fountain חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of life לָ֝ס֗וּר <S%H5493><s%> to depart מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי <S%H4170><s%> from the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

בְּרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> In the multitude עָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of people הַדְרַת־ <S%H1927><s%> honour מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [is] the king's וּבְאֶ֥פֶס <S%H657><s%> but in the want לְ֝אֹ֗ם <S%H3816><s%> of people מְחִתַּ֥ת <S%H4288><s%> [is] the destruction רָזֽוֹן׃ <S%H7333><s%> of the prince

אֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> [He that is] slow אַ֭פַּיִם <S%H639><s%> to wrath רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> [is] of great תְּבוּנָ֑ה <S%H8394><s%> understanding וּקְצַר־ <S%H7116><s%> but [he that is] hasty ר֝֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit מֵרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> exalteth אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <S%H200><s%> folly

חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> [is] the life בְ֭שָׂרִים <S%H1320><s%> of the flesh לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart מַרְפֵּ֑א <S%H4832><s%> A sound וּרְקַ֖ב <S%H7538><s%> the rottenness עֲצָמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> of the bones קִנְאָֽה׃ <S%H7068><s%> but envy

עֹ֣שֵֽׁק־ <S%H6231><s%> He that oppresseth דָּ֭ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor חֵרֵ֣ף <S%H2778><s%> reproacheth עֹשֵׂ֑הוּ <S%H6213><s%> his Maker וּ֝מְכַבְּד֗וֹ <S%H3513><s%> but he that honoureth חֹנֵ֥ן <S%H2603><s%> him hath mercy אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> on the poor

בְּֽ֭רָעָתוֹ <S%H7451><s%> in his wickedness יִדָּחֶ֣ה <S%H1760><s%> is driven away רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked וְחֹסֶ֖ה <S%H2620><s%> hath hope בְמוֹת֣וֹ <S%H4194><s%> in his death צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous

בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> in the heart נָ֭בוֹן <S%H995><s%> of him that hath understanding תָּנ֣וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> resteth חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> Wisdom וּבְקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> but [that which is] in the midst כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים <S%H3684><s%> of fools תִּוָּדֵֽעַ׃ <S%H3045><s%> is made known

צְדָקָ֥ה <S%H6666><s%> Righteousness תְרֽוֹמֵֽם־ <S%H7311><s%> exalteth גּ֑וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation וְחֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [is] a reproach לְאֻמִּ֣ים <S%H3816><s%> to any people חַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> but sin

רְֽצוֹן־ <S%H7522><s%> favour מֶ֭לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king's לְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> servant מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> [is] toward a wise וְ֝עֶבְרָת֗וֹ <S%H5678><s%> but his wrath תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מֵבִֽישׁ׃ <S%H954><s%> is [against] him that causeth shame
